import React from 'react' export default function Likes({item}) { const handleDelete = useCallback(async (el) => { await dispatch(removeLike(el)) await dispatch(likeList()) }, []) const singleItem = useCallback((item) => { navigate(`/home/${item.id}`) }, []) return (
singleItem(item.product)} className="likeCard ">
{item.product.title}

{item.product.short_desc}

{item.product.price + '$'}

e.stopPropagation()}> {basket.find((id) => id === item.product_id) ? : }
) }
